TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 提供各種屬性變更事件的資料。

span.span: Provides data for various property changed events.

summary.span: 這些事件通常會報告唯讀相依性屬性值中的有效值變更。

span.span: Typically these events report effective value changes in the value of a read-only dependency property.

summary.span: 此外，也可以當做 實作的一部分來使用。

span.span: Another usage is as part of a implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用的事件事件資料的類別和方法實作處理常式，一般會遵循命名模式`Is*Changed`，和通常會實作為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件，而不需要（它們不是路由的事件） 的支援。The events that use the class for event data, and the method implementations for handlers, generally follow the naming pattern `Is*Changed`, and are generally implemented as [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] events without backing (they are not routed events). 某些類別處理常式會 「 處理 」 否則的方法顯示事件，例如報告屬性變更，透過狀態變更時，它，也使用事件資料的類別。Some class handling methods that "handle" otherwise unexposed events that report a state change through a property change, such as , also use the class for event data. 案例是使用來自屬性系統評估之屬性的報表舊和新值的引數。The scenario for is to use the arguments to report old and new values that come from the property system evaluation of the property. 處理新舊值的回呼可能會選擇根據這些值，例如選擇不回應會被視為無意義的值變更的特殊處理。A callback that processes old and new values might choose special handling depending on these values, such as choosing to not respond to value changes that are deemed insignificant. ## Examples 下列範例會使用類別的內容中也會定義事件的自訂類別的特定屬性。The following example uses the class in the context of a for a particular property of a custom class that also defines events. 回呼當成結果舊和新的值，則屬性系統所傳達，和這些不同的事件引數類別 repackages 。The callback takes the results of old and new values from the property system as communicated by , and repackages these into a different events arguments class . 做為資料然後使用新的引數"ValueChanged 」 事件所定義和自訂類別所引發。The new arguments are then used as the data for a "ValueChanged" event defined by and raised by the custom class. [!code-csharp[CustomControlNumericUpDownOneProject#DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CustomControlNumericUpDownOneProject/CSharp/NumericUpDown.cs#dependencypropertychangedeventargs)] [!code-vb[CustomControlNumericUpDownOneProject#DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CustomControlNumericUpDownOneProject/visualbasic/numericupdown.vb#dependencypropertychangedeventargs)]

param.name: property
param.span: 變更之相依性屬性的識別項。

span.span: The identifier for the dependency property that changed.

param.name: oldValue
param.span: 在相關事件或狀態變更報告變更之前的屬性值。

span.span: The value of the property before the change reported by the relevant event or state change.

param.name: newValue
param.span: 在相關事件或狀態變更報告變更之後的屬性值。

span.span: The value of the property after the change reported by the relevant event or state change.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 報告相依性屬性變更的自訂事件的實作器應該使用這個建構函式時引發事件，填入事件資料與變更的細節。Implementers of custom events that report dependency property changes should use this constructor for populating the event data with the specifics of the change when the event is raised.

summary.span: 傳回值，這個值表示提供的物件是否等於目前的 。

span.span: Returns whether the provided object is equivalent to the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供值的型別應該隨時可以報告的相依性屬性的型別轉型。The type of the value provided should always be castable to the type of the dependency property being reported. ## Examples 下列範例會使用類別的內容中也會定義事件的自訂類別的特定屬性。The following example uses the class in the context of a for a particular property of a custom class that also defines events. 回呼當成結果舊和新的值，則屬性系統所傳達，和這些不同的事件引數類別 repackages 。The callback takes the results of old and new values from the property system as communicated by , and repackages these into a different events arguments class . 做為資料然後使用新的引數"ValueChanged 」 事件所定義和自訂類別所引發。The new arguments are then used as the data for a "ValueChanged" event defined by and raised by the custom class. summary.span: 取得發生值變更之相依性屬性的識別項。

span.span: Gets the identifier for the dependency property where the value change occurred.

value.span: 發生值變更之相依性屬性的識別項欄位。

span.span: The identifier field of the dependency property where the value change occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性就適用於通用已註冊的數個屬性，而且必須釐清哪些屬性變更叫用回呼。This property is relevant if used within a common that is registered for several properties, and it is necessary to disambiguate which property change invoked the callback. 無關通常引發事件，因為通常沒有 1 對 1 之間的對應屬性和事件報告屬性變更。 is not typically relevant for raising events, because there is usually a 1:1 correspondence between properties and events that report the property change. 已引發的事件本身就是變更的屬性的指示。The event that was raised is itself the indication of which property changed.
